en.defaultRules:
Type "/rules command", where command is on of the following: 
 --leader-names: get all leader names. Could be useful when you want to ban someome
--draft: get draft command info and examples
--default-bans: get default bans info
en.draft:
Type /draft to get default draft for 6 players with default bans
Example: /draft will create draft for 6 players with default bans.

You can choose players count by supplying a number.
Example: /drafts 7 will create draft for 7 players with default bans.

You can provide you own bans in addition to standard ones.
Example: /draft 7 bans=fred,ghandi,gorg will create draft for 7 players and will ban default leaders plus Frederick Barbarossa, Ghandi and Gorgo.

Also you can exclude default bans by providing --no-default-bans flag
Example: /draft bans=fred --no-default-bans will create draft for 6 players and will ban just Frederick Barbarossa.

You can learn leaders names by typing /rules --leaderNames.
You can learn default bans by typing /rules --default-bans

Important: most likely /draft would ban more leaders than you provided in order to distribute equal amount of them for each player.
Example: We have 36 civilizations and 5 default bans (31 remaining) and 10 players, that means every player could pick one of 3 leaders (3leaders * 10players = 30leaders) and (31 - 30 = 1) one leader will be banned randomly.

ru.defaultRules:
Набери "/rules команда", где "команда" одно из значений: 
 --leader-names: все имена лидеров. Полезно, если хочешь кого-то забанить в процессе драфта.
--draft: помощь по драфту и примеры
--default-bans: информация по дефолтным банам
ru.draft:
/draft - драфт на 6 со стандартными банами
/draft 7 - драфт на 7 со стандартными банами
/draft 9 bans=gorg,fred - драфт на 9 со стандартными банами + frederick barbarossa + gorgo
/draft bans=gorg,fred --no-default-bans - драфт на  6  без стандартных банов, но как минимум в бане окажутся барбаросса и горго

Дополнительно в бане могу оказаться несколько случайных лидеров, чтобы их количество в драфте было кратно количеству игроков
